title: duck_coop_temperature_evening
summary: Evening temperature and humidity record inside the duck coop.
description: This data unit records the evening temperature and relative humidity inside the duck coop at MaMeeFarm. Values are captured directly from the HTC-2 temperature and humidity monitoring device. No interpretation or adjustment has been applied.

reference_context.note: Referenced for daily environmental comparison only.

external_reference.note: Image used as primary evidence for displayed measurements.
